item.description:
Climb 5-8PM. Bring a rope and other top rope gear if you have it.

Hey,,, I will try to be at the K wall at 4PM - but just show up and look for me anytime... I will be in green pants. Bring a flash light if you want to climb into the night. New climbers are cool. Just let an experienced person know that you are new and need help. I will try to bring an extra harness but you should have your own harness and shoes... what else?... Oh yea, bring bug spray or have the blood sucked out of you.
3 cheers:)
Geoff
617 501-6217
item.name: Climb Quincy Quarries.
